8)> >From EQ Lizer:
8)> "This is one of the most sought after items in the game for
8)melee classes.
8)> It is worn in your belt slot. It increases your attack
8)speed by roughly 25%
8)> and can be found in Lower Guk."
8)
8)Another note on the sash, while the test posted showed it with a L27
8)bard, you can forget getting one until you can take a tough group of
8)L45+ players into lower guk, unless your guild is very pro-twinking.

Or you're willing to pay some 10,000 plat for one. :)
